attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has not only presided over the Governments reactionary handling off the banking crisis, he was the Chancellor responsible for this country's finances in the preceeding years. He has also singularly failed to eradicate the corruption within parliament, highlighted by the fraudulent expense claims of his own cabinet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
